hero.label: NEXTMOTION REVOLUTION
hero.title: Nextmotion Revolution for Unmatched Aesthetic Photos
hero.description: Discover Nextmotion Revolution for Unmatched Aesthetic Photos

solutions.title: The Gold Standard of Standardization
solutions.description: Discover How the Nextmotion Revolution Machine, Combined with the NM Capture App, Can Transform Your Before/After Photos and Videos. Achieve professional results with advanced features and unparalleled image quality.

feature1.title: Nextmotion Revolution
feature1.description: Nextmotion Revolution is a rotating motorized machine controlled by the iPhone and the NM Capture app. It rotates around the patient at a constant speed, ensuring optimal standardization of images in both photo and dynamic video formats.

robot.title: Rotating Motorized Robot
robot.description: Nextmotion Revolution is controlled by the NM Capture app via your iPhone, ensuring a constant rotation for highly standardized shots. The blue background allows for perfect separation of faces and bodies, providing you with flawless content.

standardization.title: Optimal Standardization
standardization.description: Achieve consistent lighting, shadows, positions, and colors with every capture, along with the same dynamic expressions if you choose to make videos. The content you will create is sure to impress.

quality.title: Superior Quality
quality.description: Obtain original and differentiating content that will help you attract and convert more patients: photos and videos taken with our device will be of unmatched professional quality.

feature2.title: Patient Experience
feature2.description: Offer a Unique Experience to Your Patients with Nextmotion Revolution; the modern and aesthetic device not only enhances the patient experience but also sets your clinic apart from competitors.

experience.title: Unique Experience
experience.description: Provide your patients with an innovative and memorable experience using modern technology that reassures them about the quality of care you offer in your clinic.

device.title: Aesthetic Device
device.description: A visually appealing machine that will seamlessly integrate into your premises and enhance their appearance.

differentiation.title: Differentiation of Your Clinic
differentiation.description: Utilize technology that your patients won't find anywhere else, significantly improving the experience they have during their successive visits to your clinic.

feature3.title: Portfolio and Tags
feature3.description: Integrate tags to your medias and Build a Complete Portfolio: add tags to your photos and create a comprehensive portfolio of your treatments. Use it to illustrate your treatment plans during consultations and showcase the results achieved to demonstrate your expertise to patients.

organization.title: Tags
organization.description: Add tags to your photos for easy searching, allowing you to find any before/after images in seconds.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Build a comprehensive portfolio of all your treatments, which will be your best asset for converting patients to the proposed procedures.

consultation.title: Consultation Illustration
consultation.description: Showcase results already achieved with similar patients to highlight your expertise, reassure, and build trust.

feature4.title: Transparent Results
feature4.description: Ensure clear communication and adherence to regulations, building trust with your patients while maintaining the highest standards of care and ethical practice.

evidence.title: Visual Evidence
evidence.description: Capture images from all angles for comprehensive initial documentation of all your patients.

protection.title: Legal Protection
protection.description: Protect yourself against complaints about lack of results and mitigate potential disputes from the outset with our ultra-standardized before/after videos.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Meet documentation standards with complete images that will form the foundation of your patient records.

feature5.title: Dynamic Videos
feature5.description: Use Nextmotion Revolution's Dynamic Videos: showcase the natural results achieved. Extract photos at any point in the video for precise image comparisons.

trust.title: Transparency and Trust
trust.description: Utilize the power of dynamic videos to instill confidence in your patients about the natural results achieved with treatments, such as Botox that doesn't freeze expressions when done correctly, or lip injections that provide a natural look when smiling or puckering.

engagement.title: Maximum Engagement
engagement.description: Create captivating content to illustrate your social media posts and provide material for all your communication channels.

angles.title: Multi-Angle Results
angles.description: Showcase your results from all angles to better demonstrate the quality of your care.

comparisons.title: Dynamic Comparisons
comparisons.description: Select any moment in the video to extract photos and compare them in perfect synchronization.

feature6.title: Use case
feature6.description: Discover How Clinics Use Nextmotion Revolution and see how they are enhancing the quality of their before/after photos and videos, attracting more patients in the process.

feature7.title: Compact Design
feature7.description: Thanks to its built-in battery, Nextmotion Revolution requires no power outlet or dedicated space. It can operate in any environment while delivering high-quality photos and videos with maximum standardization. It only needs a floor space of just 1.5 square meters for daily use.

newOffer.description: Enjoy a 35% discount on the Nextmotion Revolution device !
newOffer.availability: (Available on 20 units only, between jan 30 and feb 1st 2025 - 6pm CET)

discover.title: Want to go further ?
discover.description: Integrate your images directly into your interface with NextMotion Photo and NextMotion 3D

items.question: What does the purchase of the Revolution machine include?
items.answer: The purchase includes: The motorized rotating robot, Lighting (two LED lamps on stands), Unlimited NM Capture license.

items.question: Do I need to pay monthly fees or a subscription?
items.answer: No, you can use the machine and the application without paying any monthly fees.

items.question: I would like to travel with the machine. Is it possible?
items.answer: Yes, the machine and its lighting kit fit into a travel suitcase weighing 32 kg, making it suitable for air travel.

items.question: I have an Android phone. How can I use the application?
items.answer: The application is not available on Android. We recommend having a dedicated iPhone for capturing photos, which stays with the machine. A minimum iPhone 12 purchase is advised for optimal usage.

items.question: How can I view the photos on my computer?
items.answer: Photos can be accessed via our Nextmotion Consult software, available through an internet connection. Images are stored in our medical cloud, with 50 GB included in the subscription. Additional storage is available for â‚¬49/month.

items.question: Is the machine under warranty? What should I do in case of a breakdown?
items.answer: Yes, the machine is under a 2-year warranty. In case of a breakdown, we provide remote support and assistance to replace defective parts. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

items.question: Is training provided with the purchase of the machine?
items.answer: Yes, a 2-hour training session is included with the purchase. It is conducted remotely via video conference. Additionally, our academy offers numerous training videos. The machine is simple to assemble and use.

items.question: Is the application available on Android?
items.answer: Yes, our application is available on both Android and iOS platforms. You can download it from the Google Play Store for Android devices. We ensure full functionality and regular updates across both platforms.

items.question: What if I don't have an iPhone or iPad?
items.answer: No worries! Our application is compatible with Android devices as well. You can use any modern smartphone or tablet running Android 8.0 or higher. Additionally, we offer web-based solutions for desktop users.

items.question: Can I import my personal photos into the application?
items.answer: Yes, you can easily import your existing photos into the application. We support various image formats including JPEG, PNG, and HEIC. You can import photos from your device's gallery or directly from your camera.

items.question: Can I add my clinic's logo after cropping the patient's image?
items.answer: Yes, you can customize your images by adding your clinic's logo. Our application includes a watermark feature that allows you to add your logo in various positions with adjustable size and opacity settings.

items.question: Is the IMCAS offer free?
items.answer: The IMCAS offer includes a special trial period with access to premium features. While basic features are available for free, premium features require a subscription. Contact our sales team for current promotional offers and pricing details.

items.question: How much does the monthly subscription cost?
items.answer: Our subscription plans are designed to be flexible and cost-effective. The monthly subscription starts at â‚¬99/month, with different tiers available based on your needs. We also offer annual plans at a discounted rate. Contact our sales team for detailed pricing and custom enterprise solutions.

items.question: I work in multiple clinics. Can I use the application anywhere?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely! Our application is designed for mobility. You can use your account across multiple locations, and all your data syncs automatically. This makes it perfect for practitioners who work at different clinics or locations. Just log in to your account on any device to access all your photos and settings.

items.question: Can I view the before/after photos on a computer?
items.answer: Yes, you can access your before/after photos on any computer through our web platform. We provide a seamless cross-platform experience, allowing you to capture photos on your mobile device and view, edit, or present them on your computer. The web interface offers additional features for presentation and patient consultation.

questions.question: Do I need the NextMotion Revolution machine to use NM Capture?
questions.answer:
The NextMotion Capture app can be used with or without the NextMotion Revolution.

Combined with the NextMotion Revolution, you will be able to make dynamic 180Â° or 360Â° videos around your patient with a maximum level of standardization.

From these videos it will be possible to extract comparative photos from any angle.

Find more explanations from our dedicated page.

questions.question: Can I subscribe to NextMotion 3D only?
questions.answer: The answer is yes. Just download Nextmotion 3D and subscribe from the app. If you already have a NextMotion Consult or Capture account, you will find the list of your patients directly in the NextMotion 3D application.

founder.title: Innovation at the service of physicians and their patients
founder.quote: Since our beginnings, we invested most of our time and money in R&D. We are now a fast growing company with industrial processes ready to conquer the world. Thanks to our experts board that invested â‚¬1 million in 2019, our roadmap is constantly enriched with disruptive solutions and updates for our clients.
founder.name: Dr Emmanuel Elard

team.title: In the field, experts at your service

members.name: Per Heden
members.description: Associate Professor in Plastic Surgery at the Karolinska University. Founder of Akademikliniken, Europe's largest plastic surgery hospital. Inventor of a new technology for simplified segmental fat grafting. One of the earliest users of botulinum toxin (1994) and HA fillers (1996), he has held numerous international workshops and demonstrations relating to the optimal use of these products.

members.name: Constantin Stan
members.description: Certified Plastic and Reconstructive Surgeon and Head and Neck Surgeon at UMF Bucharest. Member of the Romanian Society of Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery, and of the International Society of Aesthetic Plastic Surgery (ISAPS and IPRAS). Active educating plastic surgeon.

members.name: Jean-Paul Meningaud
members.description: Maxillofacial Surgeon, Head of Department of plastic surgery, France. Member of National Academy of Surgery. Author of numerous scientific publications.

members.name: Dr. Nabila Azib
members.description: International speaker and coauthor of several books. She has been Scientific Director of the AMWC Congress in Dubai for several years, Scientific Coordinator of the FACE Congress in Cannes, and she is now Scientific Director of the Expert2Expert Meeting in Cosmetics in Istanbul. As a Plastic Surgeon, she is able to provide in-depth insights into anatomy and the related aesthetic treatments.

members.name: Ali Pirayesh
members.description: Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgeon. President of the Dutch Society for Aesthetic Plastic Surgery. Member of the Royal College of Surgeons of England and Ireland. International expert in Aesthetic Plastic Surgery, pioneer of artificial skin.

list.title: Transform Your Practice into a Thriving Business: Best Practices to Attract and Retain Patients in Medical Aesthetics ðŸš€
list.description: In this episode, Lisa and Adam dive into practical tips for aesthetic doctors and surgeons on how to grow their practice and build patient loyalty. They discuss strategies for converting leads, attracting new clients, and creating a personalized patient experience. They also highlight the importance of staying at the cutting edge of innovation and using tech tools like Nextmotion Capture to enhance treatment results and transparency.

list.title: Digital Transformation in Aesthetic Medicine: A Deep Dive with NextMotion
list.description: Welcome to the NextMotion podcast, where Sam and Lisa explore the world of digital transformation in aesthetic medicine. NextMotion is a comprehensive platform tailored specifically for aesthetic clinics, offering tools to manage patient records, schedule appointments, capture before-and-after photos, handle finances, and much more.

list.title: Growing Your Aesthetic Practice: Patient Acquisition vs. Retention
list.description: In this episode, we dive into two essential strategies for aesthetic medical clinics: acquiring new patients and retaining existing ones. Sam and Lisa discuss the pros and cons of each approach, including the associated costs and the impact on clinic growth.

list.title: Digital Photography in Aesthetics: Elevating Patient Documentation
list.description: In this episode, Sam and Lisa delve into the impact of digital photography in medical aesthetics, emphasizing its role in documenting, analyzing, and presenting treatment outcomes. They discuss the advantages of digital photography, including superior image quality, instant visualization, and simplified storage.

list.title: Building Patient Loyalty in Aesthetic Clinics: Top Strategies
list.description: In this episode, Sam and Lisa dive into effective strategies for patient retention in aesthetic clinics. They explore three key approaches: enhancing the patient experience, implementing loyalty programs, and developing a targeted communication strategy.

hero.label: NEXTMOTION 3D
hero.title: Empower Your Consultations with Augmented Reality
hero.description: Nextmotion 3D lets you visualize anatomical layers in real-time, educate your patients with interactive tools, and enhance trust with cutting-edge technology.

standardSection.label: LEARN
standardSection.title: 3D Anatomy at your fingertips
standardSection.description1: Our model is composed by **anatomic layers** that can be **highlighted or removed**. This way, you will be able to perform a **digital dissection** in order to visualize any structure.
standardSection.description2: It can display **the danger zones** where a cannula will be necessary, depending on the treatment plan you have mind for your patients.
standardSection.description3: Get full access to Nextmotion 3D for just **â‚¬49/month**, no commitment required. Enjoy all features, updates, and support with the flexibility to cancel anytime.

standard2Section.label: EDUCATE
standard2Section.title: A deep understanding of the aging process
standard2Section.description1: Each anatomical layer has **2 versions: young and aged**.
standard2Section.description2: This way, you will **be able to explain your patients** fillers need to be used in order to replace fat volume loss or bones structural changes. While botulinum toxin needs to be used to relax the muscles and smooth the wrinkles.

standard3Section.label: CONVERT
standard3Section.title: Create a trusting relationship with your patients
standard3Section.description1: Turn in one tap the 3D anatomic model into an augmented reality anatomy mask that will fit directly on the face of your patients, turning your iPad/iPhone into **a magic mirror**.
standard3Section.description2: NextMotion 3D is the **best way to explain** your patients the aging process.

questions.question: How much does the application license cost?
questions.answer: The license is â‚¬49/month per user, with no commitment. You can cancel anytime.

questions.question: Does the application work on Android and iOS?
questions.answer: Yes, absolutely. The app is compatible with both smartphones and tablets, whether they run on Android or iOS.

questions.question: Is the anatomy displayed on the screen specific to my patient?
questions.answer: No, the displayed anatomy is a "generalized" model shown in augmented reality. It provides a reference for the location of anatomical structures. However, variations do exist depending on the patient's sex, body type, and age.

questions.question: Can I use the application on a computer?
questions.answer: If you have a Mac, you can install the app via the App Store on your computer. Unfortunately, for Android users, Nextmotion 3D cannot currently be used on a computer.

interface.description: All relevant information on a single pageâ€”no more wasting time searching for the right consultation, before/after photos, treatment plan, or administrative documents.

observations.title: Automated Observations
observations.description: Using our quick questionnaires (Bolt notes) or AI-powered transcription of consultation audio recordings, your observations are effortlessly recorded, allowing you to focus on your patients.

treatment.title: Treatment Plans
treatment.description: Generate quotes, consents, and invoices with just one click.

feature2.title: Process Optimization
feature2.description: Optimize your clinical processes and efficiently delegate tasks to your team. Improve photo capture and document management for a smoother practice.

capture.title: Nextmotion Capture

dictation.title: Voice Dictation
dictation.description: Quickly draft your observations with the integrated voice dictation feature.

questionnaire.title: Pre-Consultation Questionnaire
questionnaire.description: Have patients fill out questionnaires at reception or on their smartphone, synchronized with their medical records.

signature.title: Electronic Signature
signature.description: Have administrative documents signed electronically before the consultation.

speed.title: Generate documents lightning speed
speed.description: Design beautiful document templates with your logo and own layout, generate them in one click and ask your patients to sign them electronically. Zero paper and zero stress

Solution.title: Multiplatform Solution
Solution.description: Add a new patient from iPhone, design his treatment plan from our web-software and ask him to sign quote and consent forms on your iPad. Get a taste of our intuitive and user-friendly multiplatform solution

feature3.description: Track and Analyze Your Clinic's Performance: Monitor key indicators to make informed decisions that enhance your services and optimize growth.

feature6.title: Practice Growth
feature6.description: Use Our Tools to Grow and Optimize Your Practice: enhance patient interactions and boost your marketing efficiency to drive growth and improve your clinic's performance.

reminders.title: Automatic Reminders
reminders.description: Send SMS and email reminders to patients to encourage them to book follow-up appointments.

export.title: Patient Export
export.description: Manage personalized or automated follow-ups through Zapier.

conversion.title: Patient Conversion

feature7.title: Treatment records
feature7.description: Nextmotion Consult can be used seamlessly with an iPhone, iPad, or any computer (Mac or PC). We offer you the opportunity to test a part of the patient journey using an iPad to show you how our solution can simplify your practice.
feature7.note: Simply click on 'Start the demo' below to get started !

feature8.title: Integration center
feature8.description: Nextmotion allows you to seamlessly connect your clinic to a wide ecosystem of tools via our marketplace. Enjoy native integrations with solutions like Mailchimp, Brevo, HubSpot, and Stripe to automate your communications, simplify payment processing, and boost your clinic's efficiency. With a single click, access these services to improve both performance and patient relationships.

crm.title: Mailchimp, Brevo & HubSpot
crm.description: Automate marketing campaigns, schedule communications, and track patient engagement with smooth integrations with these CRM platforms.

stripe.title: Stripe
stripe.description: Simplify online payments with Stripe, providing your patients with a secure and fast way to pay for consultations directly through the online booking system.

zapier.title: Zapier
zapier.description: Connect over 8,000 apps to Nextmotion, allowing you to further customize workflows and automate repetitive tasks like appointment reminders or resource management.

Integrations.title: APIs for Custom Integrations
Integrations.description: Our APIs enable you to take integration even further with your internal systems. Whether you're embedding the online booking page directly into your website or syncing your patient database with existing software, our APIs provide full flexibility to meet your specific needs.

feature9.description: Sophie, assistant to Dr. Loubeyres in Pau, reduced her administrative time by 32%, saving over 1.5 hours a day to focus more on patient care.

hero.label: Virtual Classes
hero.title: The next level of remote trainings
hero.description: Bring immersive remote training to the next level with mixed reality and holographic technologies.

standard.label: FUNCTIONING
standard.title: A new standard is born
standard.description: **NextMotion VirtualClasses** is a smart and efficient alternative to traditional training formats which is cost saving for companies and impactful for students willing to master the newest techniques using an immersive environment where they can have a direct interaction with their trainer.

hardware.label: HARDWARE
hardware.title: All you need is web
hardware.description: VirtualClasses requires only one Hololens device to work (included in the package). The rest of the technology is accessible from a single weblink with your **iOS device** or **laptop**.

teacher.label: TEACHER
teacher.title: The future of online teaching
teacher.description: The teacher can lead a remote masterclass wearing a Hololens. Remote students can attend his session and interact with the teacher from their iPhone, iPad and laptop using Google Chrome.
teacher.button: Get in touch with a NextMotion expert

student.label: STUDENT
student.title: Learn in an immersive way
student.description: Students can benefit from a remote training session wearing a Hololens. Teachers can guide them remotely from his iPad or laptop using Google Chrome. Everybody can interact in an immersive way.
student.button: Get in touch with a NextMotion expert

market.label: MARKET OPPORTUNITIES
market.title: Training is a key driver of growth for aesthetic industries.
market.description: Customers need first to be convinced by the efficiency of the products proposed by the brand and learn how to use them properly in order to achieve the same results with their own patients. Today, multiple training formats are available with variable costs for companies

approval.title: Discover the other solutions of NextMotion

capture.title: A gold standard imaging solution that's consistent, efficient, and easy to use

consult.label: NEXTMOTION CONSULT
consult.title: An Electronic Health Records system that goes beyond your expectations

3d.label: NEXTMOTION 3D
3d.title: Turn your smartphone into a high-resolution 3D camera & digital anatomy solution

market2.label: OUR JOURNEY
market2.title:
Since our birth,
we kept on growing
at light speed pace.
market2.description: NextMotion is an innovative MedTech company established since 2016 which has started by proposing a photographic documentation solution. Furtherly, the company has created a EMR/SaaS platform to help doctors digitize their entire workflow and propose an innovative private web platform to their patients.

hero.label: ROBOTICS
hero.title: The world's first autonomous injector robot with AI for aesthetic medicine
hero.description: Meet LENA, the first injector robot self-piloted with artificial intelligence, dedicated to aesthetic medicine

standard.label: A REVOLUTION
standard.title: A new chapter opens in the aesthetic industry
standard.description1: Introducing **LENA** (**L**ight **E**nabled **N**euro-robotic **A**rm), our latest generation autonomous robotic arm able to perform botulinum toxin injections with formidable precision.
standard.description2: Unlike the human hand, LENA will reach each of the injection points you have chosen with a sub-millimeter precision without ever shaking or tiring.
standard.description3: The localization of the injection points as well as their depth will be perfectly achieved thanks to its medical robotic arm equipped with 6 axes.
standard.description4: Combined with an electronic syringe capable of consistently delivering doses calibrated to the thousandth of a ml, the injections performed by LENA are constant and perfectly reproducible.

standard2.label: HOW IT WORKS
standard2.title: A 3D vision and a dedicated app
standard2.description1: The patient's face is previously scanned in 3D to allow you to report the injection points via a dedicated iOS application. These will then be sent to the robot.
standard2.description2: LENA is equipped with a 3D camera capable of **perceiving depth and measuring distances.** After receiving your treatment plan, the robot will come alive and complete the injection points without any pain for the patient.
standard2.description3: The whole procedure will be done **under the strict supervision of a doctor.**

capabilities.label: IMCAS 2023
capabilities.title: Meet LENA and its capabilities
capabilities.description: NextMotion team would be more than pleased to meet you during IMCAS Paris 2023
capabilities.feature: You'll be able to attend live demo of LENA performing injections on a human's silicon face

hero.title: Optimisez la Gestion de Votre Clinique EsthÃ©tique avec Nextmotion
hero.description: An all-in-one solution to attract more patients, track your clinic's activity, and improve your team's performance.

solutions.title: Une seule plateforme qui centralise tous vos outils
solutions.description: Nextmotion is designed to meet the specific needs of aesthetic clinic managers. Discover how our solution can transform your clinic management by providing all the necessary tools in a single intuitive platform.

patientJourney.title: Simplified Patient Journey
patientJourney.description: The patient journey module simplifies the use of our solution by your teams through a clean interface that lists the day's patients, imposes pre-defined steps without the need to go into the medical file, and filters to sort completed, in-progress, or not-started journeys.

patientList.title: Day's Patient List
patientList.description: Quickly access the list of patients scheduled for the day, enabling efficient and stress-free management of your schedule.

predefinedSteps.title: Pre-defined Steps
predefinedSteps.description: Follow the pre-defined steps of the patient journey without having to navigate through each file. This simplifies workflow and reduces administrative management time.

journeyFilters.title: Journey Filters
journeyFilters.description: Easily filter patients by completed, in-progress, or not-started journey. This feature gives you a clear view of the state of care, allowing you to prioritize your actions and ensure rigorous follow-up.

processOptimization.title: Process Optimization
processOptimization.description: Reduce administrative time with electronic signatures and synchronized questionnaires. Easily manage fees between the clinic and practitioners. Optimize incoming calls with notes and keywords for appointments. Use advanced cash register and accounting tools for VAT and one-click exports. Intuitively track the status of present patients from our agenda.

electronicSignature.title: Electronic Signature and Synchronized Questionnaires
electronicSignature.description: Reduce administrative time with electronic document signing and pre-consultation questionnaires on tablet synchronized with medical records.

feeDistribution.title: Fee Distribution
feeDistribution.description: Easily manage fee distribution between the clinic and practitioners for transparent financial management.

incomingCalls.title: Incoming Call Management
incomingCalls.description: Keep an eye on incoming calls from your software which includes note-taking and keywords to easily identify appointment opportunities.

cashTools.title: Cash Register and Accounting Tools
cashTools.description: Use advanced tools for VAT management and customized accounting exports with one click, simplifying your accounting tasks.

patientStatus.title: Patient Status Tracking
patientStatus.description: Intuitively track the status of patients present in the clinic through our agenda, indicating settled payments, package sessions, and pending payments.

activityTracking.title: Activity Tracking
activityTracking.description: Thanks to our intuitive Dashboard, track your main activity indicators, such as the number of new patients, generated revenue, stock status, and appointment booking sources. Precisely manage unpaid invoices and anticipate future revenue based on upcoming appointments, for optimal clinic management.

newPatients.title: New Patient Tracking
newPatients.description: Thanks to our Dashboard, track the number of new patients who have made appointments. Keep an eye on your patient growth.

revenue.title: Generated Revenue
revenue.description: Visualize the revenue generated by your team over a given period. Analyze your clinic's financial performance.

stock.title: Stock Management
stock.description: Monitor your stock status with alerts to never run out. Ensure constant availability of your products.

appointmentSources.title: Appointment Booking Sources
appointmentSources.description: Identify the sources of your patients' appointment bookings. Optimize your marketing efforts based on the most effective channels.

unpaid.title: Unpaid Invoice Tracking
unpaid.description: Perform precise tracking of unpaid invoices for rigorous financial management. Easily follow up on late payments.

revenueForecast.title: Revenue Forecast
revenueForecast.description: Anticipate revenue based on upcoming appointments. Strategically plan to maximize your future income.

performance.title: Performance Analysis
performance.description: Use key indicators to evaluate and improve your clinic's performance. Make informed decisions for optimal management.

agenda.title: Agenda and Appointments
agenda.description: Our Agenda section offers complete management of schedules by room, collaborator, and machine, enabling optimal organization of your aesthetic clinic. Easily integrate our online appointment booking portal directly on your website, offering your patients a user-friendly interface to schedule their visits. Additionally, automated SMS and email reminder management ensures your patients never forget their appointments, reducing no-shows and increasing your clinic's efficiency.

onlinePortal.title: Online Appointment Booking Portal
onlinePortal.description: Easily integrate our online appointment booking portal directly on your website, offering your patients a user-friendly interface to schedule their visits.

reminders.title: Automated SMS and Email Reminders
reminders.description: Automated SMS and email reminder management ensures your patients never forget their appointments, reducing no-shows and increasing your clinic's efficiency.

feature6.title: Optimized Marketing
feature6.description: Attract more patients with targeted email and SMS campaigns. Automatically request online reviews. Collect precise data to personalize your marketing strategies and get good reviews. Integrate Google Tag Manager to know the sources of appointment bookings. Sync Nextmotion with Hubspot for smooth and efficient marketing campaign management.

emailSms.title: Targeted Email and SMS Campaigns
emailSms.description: Attract more patients with targeted email and SMS campaigns. Automatically request online reviews.

dataCollection.title: Precise Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Collect precise data to personalize your marketing strategies.

tagManager.title: Google Tag Manager Integration
tagManager.description: Integrate Google Tag Manager to know the sources of appointment bookings and optimize your marketing efforts.

hubspot.title: Hubspot Synchronization
hubspot.description: Sync Nextmotion with Hubspot for smooth and efficient marketing campaign management.

feature7.title: Patient Portal
feature7.description: The patient portal web application displays your clinic's logo and integrates an online appointment booking portal, with integrated chat and synchronized pre-consultation questionnaires. It simplifies management with electronic signatures, a digital traceability logbook, and a before/after portfolio. All documents are centralized and notifications for follow-ups, birthdays, and promotions can be sent.

customization.description: The app icon displays your clinic's logo and integrates an online appointment booking portal with the ability to modify appointments.

communication.title: Communication and Pre-consultation
communication.description: The integrated chat allows direct communication with the clinic, while the pre-consultation questionnaire automatically syncs with the patient record.

documents.title: Documents and Traceability
documents.description: Electronic signatures facilitate document management, and the digital logbook ensures traceability of interventions. The digital portfolio makes it easy to share before/after results.

centralization.title: Centralization and Notifications
centralization.description: All documents, such as invoices and prescriptions, are centralized for easy access. You can also send notifications for follow-ups, birthdays, and promotional offers (feature in development).

feature8.title: Client Case
feature8.description: MÃ©line Puech, director of CEL Gramont in Toulouse, manages a team of 27 people, including doctors, assistants, and secretaries who receive hundreds of patients every day. 'The complete integration of patient management, appointments, and accounting in Nextmotion has allowed us to simplify our daily management and improve our overall performance.'
